101-116b @#/ /'phags pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /o~M a mr-i ta bin+du dza ba ma hA su kha swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba tshim par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/ yon tan rin po che'i tshogs can khyed kyi gzungs sngags 'di phyung bas/ sems can rnams kyi bde ba chen po bskyed pa legs so legs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gang la la gzungs sngags 'di thos pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi spyan sngar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang la la'i rna lam du grags par gyur pa de yang sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du zla ba yar gyi ngo / tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bcwa lnga la smyung bar 'dug cing gso sbyong dang ldan par byas te/ spos dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / me tog dang dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa la sogs pas mchod la/ bskor ba byas nas bzlas brjod byas na/ dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur te/ sdig pa thams cad dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la spos la sogs pas mchod de/ bzlas brjod byas na rmi lam du ston par 'gyur te/ bsam

233
101-117a pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed do/ /de nas rdo rje me tog thod chen po sa gsum gyi dbang phyug dang thabs cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de'i nang nas stan las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la btud nas/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ sems can kun gyi gtso bo che/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul che ba/ /nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das/ / chos dbyings khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrib pa kun las nges par grol/ /nyon mongs dri ma kun sel cing / /nyes pa kun las rnam par grol/ /skyon bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lam srang gcig pu'i tshul ston cing / /theg pa gcig pu'i tshul gcig pa/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul brnyes te/ /theg pa dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /snang ba chen po snang ba brnyes/ /yon tan dkyil 'khor 'jig rten bdag /zla ba bzhin du 'od dkar ba/ /'jig rten 'das pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /theg pa chen po dag pa che/ /sangs rgyas theg pa rtogs gyur cing / /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnam grags pa/ /rdo rje chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /dpa' bo chen po bdud las rgyal/ /dar ba chen po nyon mongs choms/ /bgegs thub gshin rje thub pa ste/ / rin chen dra ba khyod phyag 'tshal/ /zla ba chen po nyi ma che/ /lhun po chen po dbang phyug che/ /lha chen mgon po chen po ste/ /'byor pa chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sgrib pa thams cad gcod mdzad cing / /sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad pa/ /kun mkhyen yon tan bdag nyid che/ /rnam sel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul zhugs pa ste/ /chos kyi spyod yul gshegs pa lags/ /ye shes dbang phyug ye shes che/ /sred bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku mdzes yon

234
101-117b tan snying po mkhyen/ /rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor brgyan/ /sangs rgyas lam ste don yod che/ /ye shes dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /bstan pa gnas pa dbang bdag po/ /bde mdzad thugs kyang zhi ba ste/ /yangs pa dri med shes rab can/ /snang ba dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /zab cing brtan la rnam par gnon/ /zhi la 'jig rten dag par mdzad/ /ston pa skyabs 'os srid gsum na/ /dpa' btsan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skal ba chen po nyon mongs bcom/ /'khor ba'i dkyil 'khor 'joms pa ste/ /zhi ba zhi mdzad bde 'byung ba/ /chu bo zhi mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal/ /thar ba'i rgyu ste chos lugs che/ /bde 'gror gnas pa dri ma med/ /rnam dag thugs mnga' zhi ba mkhyen/ /nyes sel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtse mo yangs par rnam par grags/ /sngags chen mang pos 'dul mdzad pa/ /snying po chen po dkyil 'khor mchog /dkyil 'khor mkhyen pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sdug bsngal gsum sel gsum gyi mchog /dkon mchog gsum dang spyod yul 'dra/ /rnam gsum mkhyen pa rnyed pa'i bdag /rnam thar gsum khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi/ /'byor ba brnyes shing mnyam nyid brnyes/ /bskal ba dag ni grangs med par/ /tshogs chen bsags pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sa la gnas pa sa chen brnyes/ /sa yi 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/ /yang dag sa 'dzin las byung ba/ /ye shes sa khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa/ /nyes gsum spong zhing sdig pa sel/ /ting 'dzin mkhyen cing rgya che ba/ /mnyam pa nyid mnyam khyod phyag 'tshal/ /mgon po chen po snang ba che/ /sdug bsngal chen po'i dri ma sel/ /zhi gyur ma lus zhi mdzad pa/ /yon tan pha mtha' khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas kun mtshungs gsung ldan pa/ /chos

235
101-118a kun zhi ba phun sum tshogs/ /dkon mchog gsum rigs dpe med pa/ /rin chen mtha' yas khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje chen po dri med mchog /rdo rje'i mtshon pa snams sdig mi mnga'/ /nam mkha' ma lus yul dang ldan/ / ye shes spyod yul rgya mtsho mnga'/ /de bzhin gshegs dang yul gcig pa/ /sel ba po ste dri ma sbyong / /shes rab chen po rgyal ba'i sras/ /sred gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i mchog /rdo rjes 'dul ba rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje rtsal can rnams kyi rtsal/ /rdo rje snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen chen po rin chen blo/ /rin chen rdo rje 'od che ba/ /rin chen 'od mdzes rin chen 'byung / /rin chen bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi yul brnyes pa/ /ye shes stong pa nyid kyis ston/ /stong nyid longs spyod yul dang ldan/ /stong nyid mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab mtshungs med shes rab can/ /dge ba rnam dag sa dang bral/ /chos gcig las byung snang ba po/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul chen lags/ /'jig rten snang mdzad smra mkhas pa/ /'jig rten chos las rnam par 'das/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa'i yon tan brnyes/ /brgyan par mdzad pa dkyil 'khor dag /nyes pa ma lus sel ba ste/ /phal chen skye bo kun la phan/ /sa 'dzin rnam par grags pa po/ /kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dga' mkhyen dga' la longs spyod pa/ /dga' ba'i rigs mchog rnams kyi mchog /dga' bar mdzad pa'i rtog pa can/ /dga' la snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sgeg chen 'jam zhing dgongs par ldan/ /rnam par sgeg la spyod pa brtan/ /rdo rje rig pa sgeg pa'i mchog /sgeg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog /

236
101-118b rdo rje mchog gi dkyil 'khor che/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/ /bla med mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa'i mchog /sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad la/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor rnams kyis/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas/ /rdo rje'i bstan pa rnam grags pa/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /kye ma 'byor chen snang ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor pa/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ /'di dag so sor rjod byed na/ / nga ni nyes pa kun zlog cing / /rtag tu de yi phyi bzhin 'brang / /nang par langs nas gtsang ma yis/ /sgrib pa thams cad sel ba la/ /blo ldan gang zhig stod byed pa/ /de yi sdig pa med par 'gyur/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog /nang par langs nas rjod byed pa/ /sdang ba thams cad de dbang 'gyur/ /bgegs rnams kyis kyang yongs su gtang / /sdig pa dag pa 'thob pa dang / /de bzhin bsod nams 'phel ba dang / /ye shes rgya mtsho longs spyod cing / /sa mchog chen po thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig nges par gnas byas la/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'don pa/ /des ni 'byor chen sangs rgyas sa/ /ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur/ /rgyud chen ldan zhing blo che ba/ /gang zhig ming mchog 'don pa ni/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa la/ /ring por mi thogs 'jug par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //
